mapper.select: SELECT m.member_name AS memberName, m.member_birth AS memberBirth, m.member_phone AS memberPhone, m.member_email AS memberEmail, m.member_level AS memberLevel, CASE WHEN m.member_active = 1 THEN '활동회원' WHEN m.member_active = 0 THEN '비활성 회원' END AS memberStatus FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT m.member_name AS memberName, m.member_level AS memberLevel, CASE WHEN m.member_role = 'ADMIN' THEN '관리자' WHEN m.member_level >= 500 THEN '골드' WHEN m.member_level >= 300 THEN '실버' ELSE '브론즈' END AS memberLevelLabel FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}
